narratives.description:
The senior software architect is largely responsible for the development of new programs and software for technologically based organizations. This position includes working with a team of individuals to identify the goals of the software, develop a system for implementation, and overseeing the development process. This includes reviewing code that subordinates have written to ensure it is works correctly and researching the most up-to-date techniques in software design. In addition, the senior software architect spends a great deal of time communicating progress on software development to subordinates, clients, project managers, and business analysts; they must be able to discuss implementation in terms and conditions that the individual less familiar with software development can understand.
A senior software architect must have extensive computer science experience and should hold an associate’s or bachelor’s degree in the field.  Additionally, the architect must have in-depth experience and knowledge of various computer codes, including Java, C++, .NET, and C#. Particular companies may ask for proficiency or mastery in coding schemes specific to mobile technology, such as HTML5, or web technology, such as JavaScript.
narratives.summaryHourly: The average pay for a Senior Software Architect is $88.25 per hour.
narratives.summarySalary: The average pay for a Senior Software Architect is $145,423 per year.

occupationalDetails.skills: Software Architecture, Cloud Computing, .NET, Java, C# Programming Language, SQL, ASP.NET Framework, HTML, JavaScript, Oracle, Amazon Web Services (AWS), C Programming Language, Internet Information Server (IIS), Java/J2EE, e-Commerce, Service Oriented Architecture (SOA), VB.Net, Python, C++ Programming Language, Microsoft Azure, UNIX, Microservices, PHP, Angular, React.js, Machine Learning, Agile Software Development, Big Data Analytics, Embedded / Real-Time / RTOS, Angular.js, Apache Hadoop, Linux, Project Management, Spring, iOS, Apache Spark, Apache Cassandra, Enterprise Application Integration, Enterprise Solutions, Pega Business Process Management (Pega BPM), Mobile applications development, Model-view-controller (MVC), Internet of Things (IoT), System Architecture, Ruby on Rails, Salesforce, Pegasystems, RESTful Web Services, Team Leadership, Software Development Management, Kubernetes, Microsoft Sharepoint Server, Microsoft SQL Server, Database, Data Analysis, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Eclipse Java IDE, Development Operations (DevOps), Git, Go (Golang) Programming Language, Node.js, NoSQL, Oracle 11g, Microsoft .NET, Software Development, Web Development, Web Performance Monitoring/Tuning, People Management, SAP ABAP, REST, Scala, Perl, Ruby, User Experience (UX) Design, Unified Modeling Language (UML), jQuery, Kotlin Programming Language, J2EE, PegaRules, PostgreSQL, Product Development, Product Management, MySQL, ETL (Extract, transform, load), Docker, Database Development, Android Operating System Development, Data Modeling, Cyber Security, Cascading Style Sheets (CSS), Database Architecture, HTML5, Objective-C, MongoDB, Test Automation, SAS, Requirements Analysis, Software Development LifeCycle (SDLC), Neo4j, Java Database Connectivity (JDBC), IT Consulting, IBM WebSphere, Design, Business Analysis, Microsoft Office, Selenium Automated Test Tool
